Devices.description: An array of objects describing status of connections of different ble-networked devices with the gateway.

items.description: Describes the status of the connection between an BLE-networked device and the gateway at a specific point in time.

NetworkId.description: Identifier of the component within the BLE-networked device that actually builds up the connection to the gateway. Usually the BLUUID if the BLE-networked device.

LoggedAt.description: The timestamp at which this connection status was monitored.
